projects.name: Loop On
projects.description: Configured, setup and developed the serverside technologies for Loop On using AWS. Loop On is a high quality cloud based collaborative business management tool that helps users keep track of different work orders, tasks, current status of those tasks, device inventories and customized historical data collected over a large period of time. The app is currently in use by Facilities Management Services - USC.

projects.name: Stock Cash
projects.description: Designed and developed a web application that consumes the Markit-on-demand Stocks API. The academic project for the same  resides on the Google App Engine platform. The APIs were later consumed by a mobile application developed for Android Devices. As a personal project the same app is also hosted on AWS and the iOS version is available on the app store.

projects.name: Gomoku game playing AI
projects.description: Developed a python program that took a given Gomoku gameboard and used a Greedy/Min-max algorithm with Alpha & Beta pruning to determine the next best move. The project required meto design and develop a heuristic function that would calculate probable moves scores and choosed the best move. I further developed a Web interface to play the game as a personal project.

projects.name: Xango - Prototype
projects.description: Xango is an Augmented Reality based Digital Menu App for Restaurants of the Future. The application would generate 3D models of the dishes and augment the same at the customers table. The augmented dishes would help estimate portions and give customers a sense of what to expect.

projects.name: Paperplanes
projects.description: As a personal project I explored the Unity game engine and developed a simple platform mobile game. The endless runner type game allowed the user to maneuver a paper plane in a 2D Space and avoid obstacles. Scoring was based on how far the player flew the plane sucessfully without getting hit. The game was programmed in C#

projects.name: Counting Quakes
projects.description: As a personal project developed a Mashup Web Application that consumed of earthquake data from USGS. The app allows users to select a time range and a minumum magnitude to filter data. The json data recieved is parsed to generate a 3D globe using the WebGL Globe from Google Chrome experiments.

projects.name: MSIDC Portal
projects.description: Developed a intranet portal for Microsoft Industrialized Development Center(MSIDC) at Capgemini India Pvt. Ltd. The portal was developed over SharePoint 2013. The first phase included developing the portal as SharePoint Web Parts. Later using responsive web UI frameworks and knockout.JS the portal was developed as a SharePoint App.

projects.name: MSIDC Operational Workflow
projects.description: As a personal project developed a Mashup Web Application that consumed of earthquake data from USGS. The app allows users to select a time range and a minumum magnitude to filter data. The json data recieved is parsed to generate a 3D globe using the WebGL Globe from Google Chrome experiments.

projects.name: GIS Image Analysis using Fuzzy Logic
projects.description: Implemented a GIS system to analyze topographical changes such as deforestation, infrastructure and pollution in water bodies in geospatial images over time. Used a K-means clustering on image pixels to isolate groups of similar pixels. Used a fuzzy function to analyzed the pixel color of the cluster and determine the land type.
